document_data.name: Maglor
document_data.deathnotes: Slain by the Knights of Myth Drannor
document_data.mainbody: '''Maglor the Apothecary''' was an agent of the [[Zhentarim]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He served within the Black Network in [[Zhentil Keep]] both before and after the rise of [[Fzoul Chembryl]] as the leader of the Black Network. His direct superior within the organization was the Head of Caravans, [[Meer]].
document_data.History: He was a spy in [[Espar]] in [[Cormyr]], where Maglor was killed in [[1355 DR]] by the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Relationship: In Espar, Maglor was an underling of [[Whisper]]. He had a son, [[Maethlin]], who like his father worked as a Zhent spy.
